actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that inspections pursuant to section 8(a) of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 shall cease pending a determination by the Supreme Court of the United States of the constitutionality of such inspections.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that all inspections under the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 cease until the Supreme Court of the United States has determined the constitutionality of such inspections.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that inspections pursuant to section 8(a) of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 shall cease pending a determination by the Supreme Court of the United States of the constitutionality of such inspections.
